name: XCTApplicationLaunchMetric
desc: A metric to record the application launch duration for a performance test.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a metric that records the time for an app to display its first frame to screen.

items.name: init(waitUntilResponsive: Bool)
items.desc: Initializes a metric that records the time for an app to display its first frame to screen, optionally waiting until the app is responsive.
